mapper.sql: deviceCardId, deviceId, registerTime, deviceModel, osVersion, appVersion, location, isJailed
mapper.insert: insert into devicecard (deviceId, registerTime, deviceModel, osVersion, appVersion, location, isJailed) values (#{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{registerTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deviceModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{osVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isJailed,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update:
update devicecard
deviceCardId = #{record.deviceCardId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
deviceId = #{record.deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
registerTime = #{record.registerTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
deviceModel = #{record.deviceModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where deviceId = #{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update devicecard set deviceId = #{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, registerTime = #{registerTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, deviceModel = #{deviceModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, osVersion = #{osVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, appVersion = #{appVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isJailed = #{isJailed,jdbcType=CHAR} where deviceCardId = #{deviceCardId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
